betterquesting:10.desc:8: Spell Wave Container is a highly efficient item for cleaning up spell waves in the later stages, it needs to be used in conjunction with the Spell Wave Distiller, the Spell Wave Container will absorb the spell waves in the aura field, just like the Aura Battery, and the Spell Wave Distiller will extract the spell waves from the Spell Wave Container and convert them into contaminating source materials, it is an extremely stable, but slightly less efficient item. \In order to create this item, you need to unlock the research "Spell Wave Vessel" located in "Occultism", which is preceded by the research "Aura Battery" and "Beginning Pearl". "Pearl of the Beginning".
